title: Brean's Tchir Says Deutsche Bank Not a Systemic Risk (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Peter Tchir, Head of Macro Strategy at Brean Capital, on global markets, Deutsche Bank, and the BOJ.
